thread.title: Ryan Reynolds And Andrew Garfield Kissed While Ryan Gosling Was Accepting Award At 2017 Golden Globes
thread.title_full: Ryan Reynolds And Andrew Garfield Kissed While Ryan Gosling Was Accepting Award At 2017 Golden Globes

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Ryan Reynolds And Andrew Garfield Kissed While Ryan Gosling Was Accepting Award At 2017 Golden Globes
text:
While Ryan Goslin was accepting his award for Best Actor in a comedy or musical film, Deadpool and Spiderman (Ryan Reynolds and Andrew Garfield) were spotted randomly making out in the background. 
Ryan Reynolds and Andrew Garfield giving us a sprinkle of Spideypool at the Golden Globes pic.twitter.com/qGLDu7gWFO
